creator: jsb_apache@360works.com
text:
I'm trying to run LifeRay from http://www.liferay.com. I've put it into the webapps folder, but I get this 
error message in catalina.out:

May 9, 2007 8:18:55 PM org.apache.catalina.startup.HostConfig deployWAR
INFO: Deploying web application archive liferay-portal-4.2.2.war
log4j:WARN No appenders could be found for logger (org.apache.commons.digester.Digester).
log4j:WARN Please initialize the log4j system properly.
May 9, 2007 8:19:08 PM org.apache.catalina.core.StandardContext start
SEVERE: Error listenerStart
May 9, 2007 8:19:08 PM org.apache.catalina.core.StandardContext start
SEVERE: Context [/liferay-portal-4.2.2] startup failed due to previous errors

I'm not asking for tech support on setting up this application. What I AM asking for is a stack trace 
showing the exception plus any root cause that prevented this from starting. At this point, there is not 
much that I can do to get the application to work, and that is Tomcat's fault for eating the error instead 
of printing it to the log.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 41686 ***
